display.title: Acquire: techreborn:implosion_compressor
description: Requires Advanced Circuit and Advanced Machine Casing
Uses the raw power of TNT to make items.
It is a multi-block machine with 64k energy buffer and 64 Et input rate.
The Implosion Compressor multi-block has 3 layers:
The first layer contains 9x Advanced Machine Casing.
The second layer containts have 8x Advanced Machine Casing with a hole in the centre.
The third layer is the same as the first layer.
Put the Implosion Compressor on the top and provide some energy to it.

subtitle.text: Requires Advanced Circuit and Advanced Machine Casing
